Event.Message: A profile deletion triggered the Windows All-User Install Agent to uninstall all packages for the user profile %1.
The Windows All-User Install Agent could not remove %1 packages during the profile deletion of the user profile %2. The error code is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PackageMoniker" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserSid" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows All-User Install Agent could not delete the registered packages after the profile was deleted for user SID %1. Error code: %2. Additional information: %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UserSid" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="location" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows All-User Install Agent detected an attempt to delete a temporary or mandatory profile for user SID %1. Package information for the user will be reset.
The Windows All-User Install Agent will delete %1 packages for user SID %2 because the profile was deleted.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NumberOfPackages" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="UserSid" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows All-User Install Agent could not retrieve a list of packages for user SID %1. The error code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UserSid" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows All-User Install Agent will delete package %1 for user SID %2 because the profile was deleted.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Package" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserSid" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: GetApplicability API failed to determine status of package %1. The error code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Package" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: GetApplicability API has determined that package %1 is either NotInstallable or RequiresReinstall. The detail code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Package" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dependent Package %1 is already installed, registration will be skipped.
